snippet.title: Mahou City [魔砲都市] Game Sample - PC/Doujin
snippet.description:
Original Air Date: September 25th, 2009

Being Dubbed "Mahou City" (For good reason), this game is an awesome re-imagining of one of my favorite NES/FC games from my childhood, Battle City, except with 3D graphics and an emphasis on funny symbolism (such as the Tank on the Game Over screen) and Mahou Shoujo (Magical Girl) fandom. The only drawback is that it doesn't seem to have 2-player co-op. Oh, and I can't do anything about the FRAPS counter on the title screen. *Shrugs*

The idea is simple: Destroy all the enemies while defending your base. You can gain several power-ups ranging from different shot patterns and barriers to changing in size and dropping almighty bombs to destroy all the current enemies on screen. Good stuff. Enjoy.

This neat game has been given out for free by the kind developers since C67. You can get it at:

http://www.nomuraz.com/denpa/haiki.htm

- ADDITION -

Visit GS At: http://www.gamingsanctuary.com
